meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being sensitive.
meanings.sent1: Her sensitivities were easily hurt by harsh words.
meanings.sent2: She had to be careful with her sensitivities when discussing difficult topics.
meanings.sent3: His sensitivities to spicy food made him cry after eating a jalapeno.
meanings.sent4: The artist's sensitivities to color combinations were unmatched in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The child's sensitivities to loud noises made fireworks unbearable for him.

meanings.definition: The capacity to respond to stimuli.
meanings.sent1: The cat's sensitivities to movement helped it catch the mouse.
meanings.sent2: The doctor tested the patient's sensitivities to touch on different parts of the body.
meanings.sent3: The robot's sensitivities to light made it turn on automatically in the morning.
meanings.sent4: The detective's sensitivities to subtle clues helped solve the mystery quickly.
meanings.sent5: The plant's sensitivities to changes in temperature allowed it to thrive in various climates.
